pages.text: The elements of the $(OS) are one the main foundations of the occult. Each of these elements are responsible of defining the $(OS) manifestations' characteristics in our Reality.

pages.title: Blood
pages.text: Blood is the entity of feeling. It seeks intensity: pain, obsession, passion, love, hunger, hatred - everything that involves feeling an extreme emotion pleases the entity of Blood. The presence of grotesque things like blood and gore is something characteristic of this element.
"Everything begins with blood. Blood is the flow that bathes the eternity of the Other Side".

pages.title: Energy
pages.text: Energy is the entity of chaos. Everything that cannot be explained, the intangible, anarchy. Everything that involves unpreditability and transformation pleases the entity of Energy. The presence of ghostly or shiny things is something characteristic of this element.
"Chaos is inevitable and everything must be chaos".

pages.title: Knowledge
pages.text: Knowledge is the entity of conscience. Discover, learn, experience, decipher. Having the perception of the Other Side and it's entities pleases the entity of Knowledge. The presence of sigils and illusions is something characteristic of this element.

pages.title: Death
pages.text: Death is the entity of time. It seeks lived moments, distorting the egoic perception of each individual's existance to its own pleasure. The presence of rot and altered time is something characteristic of this element.
"Everything has a beginning and an ending. Nothing taken by Death can return to what it was".

pages.title: Fear
pages.text: Fear is the entity of the unknown. Little is known by this element's existance.
